info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Silver Bow County through 515 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Gregson Hot Springs to 10 miles northwest of Twin Bridges. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butte, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Divide, Nissler, Ramsay, Janney and Newcomb. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 213 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
